techmeme.title: Netflix says its ad tier has 70M users globally, up from 40M in May 2024 and 22M in January 2024, and 50%+ of sign-ups are for ad plans in supported countries (Brian Steinberg/Variety)
The EU notifies Apple of "potentially prohibited geo-blocking practices" on the App Store and other apps, and says it must align with EU anti-geo-blocking rules (Gian Volpicelli/Bloomberg)
Nvidia launches its Nvidia app for Windows, designed to overhaul and replace the GeForce Experience app, after a beta earlier in 2024 (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Shopify reports Q3 revenue up 26% YoY to $2.2B, above $2.12B est., GMV up 24% YoY to $69.7B, projects Q4 revenue growth above est.; SHOP jumps 13%+ pre-market (Spencer Soper/Bloomberg)
Sea reports Q3 revenue up 31% YoY to $4.3B and a $153.3M net income, above estimates and up from a $144M loss in Q3 2023; SE rises 5%+ pre-market (Bloomberg)
